channel.title: How to get ur server online for other people?
channel.description: I know this is probably the wrong section but the client questions was all rs2 that i seen, so can any1 tell me why I can log in, but no one can connect to my register page, i know its probably a simple problem, I ran into this problem once before, and dumbass me forgot what I had to do. Can someone please post some reasons why this is happening, it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: How to get ur server online for other people?
item.dc:creator: @s_l_u_r_p_e s l u r p e
item.description:
@s_l_u_r_p_e wrote:

ok ill try that stuff, if anything else just let me know

Read full topic

item.title: How to get ur server online for other people?
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

set up wamp? or xamp or easyphp2? make sure db’s imported ect… run server? whatsmyip.org give people ur ip? i dont think im missing out just a basic guideline, make sure your ip in p2pconf.xml is the ip from whatsmyip.org, and put reg page in www/ file in your web server w.e ur using.

Read full topic
